word: 水至清则无鱼，人至察则无徒

definition: doing good is like a hard climb, doing evil is like an easy fall (idiom)

definition: without rules, nothing can be done (idiom, from Mencius); one must follow some rules

definition: to be lenient with others (idiom)

the unvarnished truth is better than a cunning ruse (idiom)/honesty is the best policy

definition: don't blame the speaker, take note of his warning (idiom); an exhortation to speak one's mind without fear of reprisals, and with the expectation of being taken seriously
pinyin: yan2 zhe3 wu2 zui4 , wen2 zhe3 zu2 jie4

definition: where it is possible to let people off, one should spare them (idiom); anyone can make mistakes, forgive them when possible
pinyin: de2 rao2 ren2 chu4 qie3 rao2 ren2

definition: What you don't want done to you, don't do to others. (idiom, from the Confucian analects)/Do as you would be done by./Do not do to others what you would not have them do to you.

definition: lit. a wise person reflecting a thousand times can still make a mistake (idiom); fig. nobody is infallible

definition: to demand perfection (idiom)

definition: lit. for some things a foot may be too short, and for the other an inch will suffice (proverb)/fig. everyone has their strong and weak points/everything has its advantages and disadvantages
